meanings.definition: The state or fact of continuing to live or exist, typically in spite of difficult circumstances.
meanings.sent1: In the wild, animals rely on their survival instincts to find food and shelter.
meanings.sent2: The survival of the fittest is a concept in nature where only the strongest animals survive.
meanings.sent3: The survival of the clumsiest squirrel in the forest is quite a sight to see!
meanings.sent4: Her determination to succeed was like a beacon of survival in the storm of challenges.
meanings.sent5: The survival of the tiny seedling against the harsh weather was truly inspiring.

meanings.definition: The act of remaining alive or in existence, especially after facing a life-threatening situation.
meanings.sent1: After the shipwreck, their survival on the deserted island became their main focus.
meanings.sent2: The survival rate of patients with this rare disease has significantly improved with new treatments.
meanings.sent3: The survival of the forgetful explorer in the jungle was a comedy of errors.
meanings.sent4: His survival in the competitive business world was like navigating a maze blindfolded.
meanings.sent5: The survival of the ancient ruins through centuries of wars is a testament to human history.
